net.lavox.libedax4j

インタフェース Edax

  • すべてのスーパーインタフェース:
    com.sun.jna.Library

    public interface Edax
extends com.sun.jna.Library
    libedax wrapper interface for Java.

    • ネストされたクラスのサマリー

      • インタフェースから継承されたネストされたクラス/インタフェース com.sun.jna.Library

        com.sun.jna.Library.Handler

    • フィールドのサマリー

      The instance of libedax wrapper.

      No Move.

      Pass.

      White.

      • インタフェースから継承されたフィールド com.sun.jna.Library

        OPTION_ALLOW_OBJECTS, OPTION_CALLING_CONVENTION, OPTION_CLASSLOADER, OPTION_FUNCTION_MAPPER, OPTION_INVOCATION_MAPPER, OPTION_OPEN_FLAGS, OPTION_STRING_ENCODING, OPTION_STRUCTURE_ALIGNMENT, OPTION_TYPE_MAPPER

    • フィールドの詳細

      • INSTANCE

        static final Edax INSTANCE
        The instance of libedax wrapper.

      • BLACK

        static final int BLACK
        Black.
        関連項目:
        定数フィールド値

      • WHITE

        static final int WHITE
        White.
        関連項目:
        定数フィールド値

      • PASS

        static final int PASS
        Pass.
        関連項目:
        定数フィールド値

      • NOMOVE

        static final int NOMOVE
        No Move.
        関連項目:
        定数フィールド値

    • メソッドの詳細

      • libedax_initialize

        void libedax_initialize(int argc,
                        java.lang.String[] argv)
        edax init function for library use.
        パラメータ:
        argc - Number of arguments.
        argv - Command line arguments. The first(0-th) value is ignored.

      • libedax_terminate

        void libedax_terminate()
        edax terminate function for library use.

      • edax_init

        void edax_init()
        init command.

      • edax_new

        void edax_new()
        new command.

      • edax_load

        void edax_load(java.lang.String file)
        load command.
        パラメータ:
        file - file name to open

      • edax_save

        void edax_save(java.lang.String file)
        save command.
        パラメータ:
        file - file name to save

      • edax_undo

        void edax_undo()
        undo command.

      • edax_redo

        void edax_redo()
        redo command.

        void edax_mode(int mode)
        mode command.
        パラメータ:
        mode - mode to set

      • edax_setboard

        void edax_setboard(java.lang.String board)
        setboard command.
        パラメータ:
        board - board to set

      • edax_setboard_from_obj

        void edax_setboard_from_obj(Board board,
                            int turn)
        setboard command with board object.
        パラメータ:
        board - board to set
        turn - player to play

        void edax_vmirror()
        vmirror command.

        rotate command.
        パラメータ:

        void edax_symetry(int sym)
        symetry command.
        パラメータ:

        play command.

        force command.

      • edax_go

        void edax_go()
        go command.

      • edax_hint

        void edax_hint(int n,
               HintList hintlist)
        hint command.
        パラメータ:
        n - number of hints.
        hintlist - result (out parameter).

      • edax_hint_prepare

        void edax_hint_prepare()
        hint command. Call edax_hint_next after calling this function.

      • edax_hint_next

        void edax_hint_next(Hint hint)
        hint command. Gets hint one by one. If there are no more hints, hint will be NOMOVE. Call edax_hint_prepare before calling this function.
        パラメータ:
        hint - result (out parameter).

      • edax_stop

        void edax_stop()
        stop command.

      • edax_move

        boolean edax_move(java.lang.String move)
        user move command.
        パラメータ:
        move - user move.
        戻り値:
        true if the move has been legally played, otherwise false.

      • edax_opening

        java.lang.String edax_opening()
        opening command.
        戻り値:
        opening name.

      • edax_ouverture

        java.lang.String edax_ouverture()
        ouverture command.
        戻り値:
        opening name in french.

      • edax_book_store

        void edax_book_store()
        book store command.

        void edax_book_deepen()
        book deepen command. caution: Currently, this function does not work correctly.

        void edax_book_feed_hash()
        book feed-hash command.

      • edax_base_problem

        void edax_base_problem(java.lang.String base_file,
                       int n_empties,
                       java.lang.String problem_file)
        base problem command.
        パラメータ:
        base_file - game database file.
        n_empties - number of empties.
        problem_file - problem_file to save.

      • edax_base_tofen

        void edax_base_tofen(java.lang.String base_file,
                     int n_empties,
                     java.lang.String problem_file)
        base tofen command.
        パラメータ:
        base_file - game database file.
        n_empties - number of empties.
        problem_file - problem_file to save.

      • edax_base_correct

        void edax_base_correct(java.lang.String base_file,
                       int n_empties)
        base correct command.
        パラメータ:
        base_file - game database file.
        n_empties - number of empties.

      • edax_base_complete

        void edax_base_complete(java.lang.String base_file)
        base complete command.
        パラメータ:
        base_file - game database file.

      • edax_base_convert

        void edax_base_convert(java.lang.String base_file_from,
                       java.lang.String base_file_to)
        base convert command.
        パラメータ:
        base_file_from - input game database file.
        base_file_to - output game database file.

      • edax_base_unique

        void edax_base_unique(java.lang.String base_file_from,
                      java.lang.String base_file_to)
        base unique command.
        パラメータ:
        base_file_from - input game database file.
        base_file_to - output game database file.

      • edax_set_option

        void edax_set_option(java.lang.String option_name,
                     java.lang.String val)
        set (option) command.
        パラメータ:
        option_name - name of option.
        val - value to set.

      • edax_get_moves

        java.lang.String edax_get_moves(java.lang.String str)
        get moves of the current game.
        パラメータ:
        str - buffer of length 160 + 1 or more (out parameter).
        戻り値:
        moves(equals to str. This is for Java, as Java String is immutable).

      • edax_is_game_over

        boolean edax_is_game_over()
        check if the current game is over.
        戻り値:
        true if game is over, otherwise false.

      • edax_can_move

        boolean edax_can_move()
        check if the current player can move.
        戻り値:
        true if the current player can move, otherwise false.

      • edax_get_last_move

        void edax_get_last_move(Move move)
        get last move.
        パラメータ:
        move - last move(out parameter).

      • edax_get_board

        void edax_get_board(Board board)
        get current board.
        パラメータ:
        board - current board(out parameter).

      • edax_get_current_player

        int edax_get_current_player()
        get current player.
        戻り値:
        current player(0:BLACK, 1:WHITE).

      • edax_get_disc

        int edax_get_disc(int color)
        get current number of discs.
        パラメータ:
        color - player's color(0:BLACK, 1:WHITE).
        戻り値:
        number of discs.

      • edax_get_mobility_count

        int edax_get_mobility_count(int color)
        get current number of legal moves.
        パラメータ:
        color - player's color(0:BLACK, 1:WHITE).
        戻り値:
        number of legal moves.

      • get_moves

        long get_moves(long P,
               long O)
        Get legal moves. Compute a bitboard where each coordinate with a legal move is set to one.
        パラメータ:
        P - bitboard with player's discs.
        O - bitboard with opponent's discs.
        戻り値:
        all legal moves in a 64-bit integer.

      • can_move

        boolean can_move(long P,
                 long O)
        Check if a player can move.
        パラメータ:
        P - bitboard with player's discs.
        O - bitboard with opponent's discs.
        戻り値:
        true or false.

      • bit_count

        int bit_count(long b)
        Count the number of bits set to one in an long.
        パラメータ:
        b - 64-bit integer to count bits of.
        戻り値:
        the number of bits set.

      • first_bit

        int first_bit(long b)
        Search the first bit set.
        パラメータ:
        b - 64-bit integer.
        戻り値:
        the index of the first bit set.

      • last_bit

        int last_bit(long b)
        Search the last bit set.
        パラメータ:
        b - 64-bit integer.
        戻り値:
        the index of the last bit set.
